== Unclear == :''Some members of the 2/18th were sent on the Sandakan Death Marches and also to the Thai-Burma Railway.''
I assume this means that some members were sent to the death marches and others to the railway, not that the same members were sent to both the death marches and the railway? Will update the article accordingly. Regards, [[User talk:BenAveling|Ben Aveling]] 11:09, 2 February 2007 (UTC)
thanks, you are correct. my apologies for the sloppy language [[User:Actuarial disco boy|Actuarial disco boy]] 18:29, 2 February 2007 (UTC)
No, thank you for creating the page. Regards, [[User talk:BenAveling|Ben Aveling]] 21:51, 2 February 2007 (UTC)
